basics.name: Stijn Callebaut
basics.summary: I'm Stijn Callebaut, COO at DexMach. I like running, the outdoors, a good book from time to time and lego. At DexMach I help put focus on operational excellence, and I engage in customers cloud journeys to have direct feedback.

work.name: DexMach
work.description: DexMach is a cloud consultancy firm enabling customers' cloud ambition(s)
work.summary: Stijn drives operational excellence at DexMach services, both professional and managed services. He believes openness and inclusiveness is key for organizational and professional growth.
highlights: streamline the hiring process with people growth
Generate support for new Dexmach operational opportunities and services
Generate support across delivery and technical circles to continuously improve services
Managing Partner alliances, including Microsoft, Github and KPMG

work.name: DexMach
work.description: DexMach is a cloud consultancy firm enabling customers' cloud ambition(s)
work.summary: Stijn helps put focus on the technology that matters and he engages in customers cloud journey's to have direct feedback. He is the main driver behind the Azure Expert MSP and Advanced specialization audits, which we obtained several years in a row now. The change to git driven operations (gitops) enabled us to scale beyond people and enabling us to focus on human interactions to improve our services and interactions with clients.
highlights: Azure advanced specialization - Windows Server and SQL Server Migration
Azure advanced specialization - Linux and Open Source Databases Migration
Azure advanced specialization - Microsoft Windows Virtual Desktop (AVD)
Azure advanced specialization - Modernization of Web Applications
Azure advanced specialization - Identity and Access Management
Git driven Operations (GitOps) as a standard in our managed services to scale beyond people.
Creating end-to-end transparancy from start to finish within our managed service offerings

work.name: DexMach
work.description: DexMach is a cloud consultancy firm enabling customers' cloud ambition(s)
work.summary: Full focus on Azure consultancy. Founder of the dexbrix catalog - a set of standardized services deployable cross tenants (customers).

work.name: DexMach
work.description: Inovativ was the leading Microsoft System Center implementor in Belgium and the Netherlands
work.summary: Consultant with a focus on System Center Service Manager (SCSM), Microsoft's ITSM tooling. Embracing SCSM meant a shift from technical implementations to understanding business requests, with a strong focus on standardization. The last couple of years, my focus shifted to incorporating Azure, with a first highlight of Platform as a Service (PaaS).

work.name: Avanade
work.description: Avanade is a joined venture of Accenture and Microsoft. A services provider with a focus on the Microsoft ecosystem
work.summary: Providing Microsoft focused consultancy, ranging from IAM services (Forefront Identity Manager) to Device management (Configuration Manager).

work.name: Econocom
work.description: Econocom is a European group that carries out projects in digital transformation for firms and public organisations
work.summary: Providing operational long term support for customers. First at Procter & Gamble with a focus on networking and Novell for the BeNeLux sites - Brussels, Mechelen, Rotterdam and Coevoorden. After a couple of years I moved to a Microsoft Configuration Manager focused role at Engie Electrabel Brussels and Antwerp.

volunteer.summary: As one of the 20 global Partner Advisory Council (PAC) members Stijn provides valuable insights that increase the success of Microsoft products, services and field engagement through ongoing feedback and twice-annual PAC meetings
highlights: provide input and feedback on product and solution direction, business model development, roadmap and sales and marketing execution
foster exchange of ideas and information between partners and Microsoft
drive interaction with partners to deliver One Microsoft

volunteer.summary: The Belgian PowerShell user group (BEPUG) brings Belgian PowerShell enthousiasts together. Our goal is bring people with a powershell interest together so we stimulate learning in a social and open environment.

volunteer.organization: System Center User Group Belgium (SCUG)- now beemug
volunteer.summary: As an active member I help in organizing events and actively contribute in speaking engagements

projects.name: Stijn.run
projects.description: My personal url shortener using Azure static web apps

awards.title: PowerShell Hero
awards.summary: A PowerShell Hero is someone who you feel does an outstanding job helping the community, perhaps by answering questions in forums (here or elsewhere), writing useful blog posts, offering education, and more.

education.institution: Hogeschool voor wetenshap en kunst (WENK) - now Odisee
